Welcome to Instrumental Convergence!

This is the personal website of Varoon Pazhyanur. Here, you will (eventually) find some of my musings on math, reviews of books that I find important, and any other thoughts that I care to develop. I will graduate in Spring 2019 with an M.S./B.S. in Mathematics from Emory University. My thesis focusses on the realizability and inscribability of 4-polytopes and is advised by David Borthwick. You can find my CV here.
